BadgeDetail.Name: Reliable
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated a consistent record of both attendance and punctuality over at least the past 3 months. It shows they are able to manage their time, deliver on their commitments and keep their promises.

Task.Title: Right here, right now
Task.Body: Upload a screenshot from iLearn showing 95% attendance and punctuality for the past 3 months.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a screenshot from iLearn showing 95% attendance and punctuality for the past 3 months.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a screenshot from iLearn showing 95% attendance and punctuality for the past 3 months.

Task.Title: Count on me
Task.Body: Upload a description of how you have kept a commitment you have made. This could be from either work or personal life. Your evidence can be a video, audio clip or a written description.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a description of how you have kept a commitment you have made. This could be from either work or personal life. Your evidence can be a video, audio clip or a written description.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a description of how you have kept a commitment you have made. This could be from either work or personal life. Your evidence can be a video, audio clip or a written description.
